original_text: They said, ‘We arrived at the prison. We saw that the soldiers had locked the gates. They were standing at the gates and they were watching carefully. But when we opened the gates of the prison, we did not find anyone there!’
korean_text: 이르되 우리가 보니 옥은 든든하게 잠기고 지키는 사람들이 문에 서 있으되 문을 열고 본즉 그 안에는 한 사람도 없더이다 하니

sentences.original_text: We saw that the soldiers had locked the gates
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 군인들이 문을 잠갔다는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: They were standing at the gates

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 주의 깊게 살피고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: But when we opened the gates of the prison
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리가 감옥의 문을 열었을 때

sentences.original_text: we did not find anyone there
